00044 
00045

00047 
00048

00050                 registeredDelivery = 0;
00051                 id = 0;
00052                 status = 0;
00053                 codingScheme = UCS2;
00054         }
00055 
00056         CodingScheme codingScheme;
00057         MessageType type;

00062         std::string to;
00063         std::string body;
00064         uint32_t status;
00065         std::string getSrcSystemId() {
00066                 size_t pos = context.find(" ");
00067                 return context.substr(0, pos);
00068         }

00083 class Request {
00084 
00085         unsigned int status;
00086         unsigned int totalParts;
00087         unsigned int partsResp;
00088         bool m_needDeliverResp;
00089 public:
00090 
00091         //      std::vector<unsigned int> parts;
00092         void setDeliverResp(bool b) {
00093                 m_needDeliverResp = b;
00094         }
00095         bool needDeliverResp() {
00096                 return m_needDeliverResp;
00097         }
00098 
00099         void SetTotalParts(unsigned int i) {
00100                 totalParts = i;
00101         }
00102 
00103         unsigned int GetTotalParts() {
00104                 return totalParts;
00105         }
00106 
00107         int HasResp(unsigned int s) {
00108 
00109                 if (s != 0) {
00110                         status = s;
00111                 }
00112                 partsResp++;
00113                 return totalParts - partsResp;
00114         }
00115 
00116         std::vector<PartStatus>* parts;
00117         int id;
00118         Message* msg;
00119 
00120         Request(int i = 0, int c = 1) {
00121                 id = i;
00122                 status = 0;
00123                 totalParts = c;
00124                 partsResp = 0;
00125                 parts = NULL;
00126                 msg = NULL;
00127                 m_needDeliverResp = false;
00128         }
00129 
00130         ~Request() {
00131                 if (parts != NULL) {
00132                         delete parts;
00133                 }
00134         }
00135 
00136         unsigned int GetStatus() {
00137                 return status;
00138         }
00139 
00140         void SetStatus(unsigned int i) {
00141                 status = i;
00142         }

00178 class Data {
00179 
00180 protected :
00181         uint8_t m_esmClass;
00182 
00183 public:
00184         void esm_class(uint8_t i) {
00185                 m_esmClass = i;
00186         }
00187 
00188         bool isNormalMessage() {
00189 
00190                 if (!(m_esmClass & 0x3c))
00191                         return true;
00192                 return false;
00193         }
00194 
00195         bool terminate;
00196         pthread_mutex_t unbindMtx;
00197         unsigned char udhMsgId;
00198         unsigned char udhTotal;
00199         unsigned char udhPartNum;
00200         std::string systemId;
00201         std::string context;
00202         Request* req;
00203         Message* msg;

00205         int lastSend;
00206         Smpp::Header* hdr;
00207         unsigned int length;
00208         bool isMultipart;
00209         bool fromUser;
00210         std::string msgId;
00211         int status;
00212         Data(Smpp::Header* h, bool direct = true) {
00213                 status = 0;
00214                 terminate = false;
00215                 hdr = h;
00216                 fromUser = direct;
00217                 udhMsgId = 0;
00218                 udhTotal = 0;
00219                 udhPartNum = 0;
00220                 lastSend = 0;
00221                 length = 0;
00222                 msg = NULL;
00223                 req = NULL;
00224         }
00225         ;
00226 
00227         Data() {
00228                 status = 0;
00229                 terminate = false;
00230                 udhMsgId = 0;
00231                 udhTotal = 0;
00232                 udhPartNum = 0;
00233                 lastSend = 0;
00234                 hdr = NULL;
00235                 length = 0;
00236                 msg = NULL;
00237                 fromUser = true;
00238                 req = NULL;
00239         }
00240         ;
00241 
00242         ~Data() {
00243 
00244                 if (hdr != NULL) {
00245                         delete hdr;
00246                 }
00247                 if (req != NULL) {
00248                         delete req;
00249                 }
00250                 if (msg != NULL) {

00254         }
00255         ;
